projectGridLines.title: Loan Against Mutual Funds
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Developing new Initiatives and Managing the Loan Against Mutual Funds for Entire Industry.

Skill sets: API Frameworks

Traits expectation: Problem Solving, Data Analysis, Product Building and Management, Marketing & Pre-sales, Market Research

Expected learning: Product Building from O to I and scaling, Management, Gauging and Working towards Product Market Fit.

projectGridLines.title: IRIS
projectGridLines.description:

Traits expectation: Problem Solving, Data Analysis, Product Building and Management, Marketing & Pre-sales, Market Research

Expected learning: Product Building from O to 1 and scaling, Management, Gauging and Working towards Product Market Fit.

projectGridLines.title: Virtual Relationship Manager
projectGridLines.description:
Description: A Powered Relationship Manager for Financial Queries and Management Support for Global Financial Support Services

Expected learning: Product Building from O to I and scaling, Management, Gauging and

Working towards Product Market Fit.

projectGridLines.title: Brokerage Module
projectGridLines.description:
Description: India's first A automation flow for calculation of brokerage for brokers and Asset Management Companies across the industry.

Traits expectation: Problem Solving, Data Analysis, Product Building and Management, Marketing & Pre-sales, Market Research

Expected learning: Product Building from O to 1 and scaling, Management, Gauging and

Working towards Product Market Fit.

projectGridLines.title: Reg Tech Platform (SAAS)
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Industry first Al based regulatory platform which will be Industry agnostic and not limited to Mutual Fund Industry.

Skill sets: Process Automation, general understanding of Al, project management

Traits expectation: Problem Solving, Data Analysis, Product Building and Management, Marketing & Pre-sales, Market Research

Expected learning: Product Building from O to 1 and scaling, Management, Gauging and Working towards Product Market Fit
